job_title: Resource Center Representative in Belleville, ON
pros: I enjoyed my time working with quinte health care. They provide the needed training and usually hire internally so it gives you the chance to move to the position you want.
cons: Not many cons, if any they expect you to accept callins when needed and there seems to be some forms of favoritism, however there is a union that can address any of your concerns
